documentation.title: Function Spacing
documentation.standard: There should be exactly 2 blank lines before a function within a statement group or control structure when it is the first block of code.

code.title: Valid: Exactly 2 blank lines before the first function.
Invalid: Too few blank lines before the first function.
Valid: Exactly 2 blank lines before the first function.
Invalid: Too many blank lines before the first function.

documentation.standard: There should be exactly 2 blank lines before and after a function declaration.

code.title: Valid: Exactly 2 blank lines before and after function declarations.
Invalid: Incorrect number of blank lines before/after function declarations.

documentation.standard: There should be exactly two blank lines after a function within a statement group or control structure when it is the last block of code.

code.title: Valid: Exactly 2 blank lines after the last function.
Invalid: Too few blank lines after the last function.
Valid: Exactly 2 blank lines after the last function.
Invalid: Too many blank lines after the last function.
